entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker crashes app on iOS 17.4 Simulator #22323
  • MacCatalyst: Tooltips are not functional #22322
  • Remove architectures except 'Any CPU' from maui-blazor-solution template #22321
  • Maui Grouped CollectionView incorrect item highlighted #22320
  • Slow Rendering issue with Custom Control when using Clipping. #22319
  • XamlC error XFC0045 with maui dotnet 9 preview 3 #22318
  • Use UIButton Configuration APIs on iOS #22315
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Memory leak with Shell Navigation #22313
  • [MAUI]When adding things to ingredients, there is only one checkbox left. #22311
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Publish a test application for AOT #22310
  • [MAUI] The UI page moves up after the virtual keyboard pops up, and the top content is not visible #22309
  • [MAUI][Multi-Project] The Solution Explorer window was empty when creating Maui Multi-project #22308
  • [MAUI][Multi-Project] Downloading the .NET9.0 SDK causes the original .NET8.0 SDK to disappear when creating a project #22307
  • Button with image not scaling to HeightRequest on iOS #22306
    .NET 8 SR6

Closed

  • Action Sheet is displayed behind the popup page #21934
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Add WebSite project type to MAUI Hybrid project type (Blazor Hybrid + Web) #1069
    9.0-preview5
  • MacCatalyst does not obey ApplicationTitle for Dock/Finder name #22317
  • Fix iOS Button layout on rotation #22314
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Embedding an iOS ContentView or Layout does not get a size #19340
    Backlog
  • CollectionView causes invalid measurements on Android rotation #21967
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [MAUI] Rotate the simulator and the page is truncated #22288
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [MAUI] Stuck when entering/exiting G6 page #19818
    .NET 8 SR6
  • In iOS, CollectionView row does not shift down if row above it resizes #22082
  • Multi-Project App template creates invalid solution when un-checking platforms #22086
    .NET 8 SR5
  • SVG to PNG do not render SVG objects of type arc #20972
  • Maui Hybrid: build fails when adding json file to ./Resources/Raw #17078
  • Button with ImageSource that's too big for button renders incorrectly #15004
    Backlog
  • . #22301

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix PopoverPresentationController for action sheet #22312
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #22234
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Trigger remeasure when constraints on CV changes #22270
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Revert ios button changes #22300
    area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮
  • Don't include removed projects #22294
    area/templates 📄

Updated

  • [build] make `TrimMode=full` function like NativeAOT #22282
    area/publishing 🏁
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #22276
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Reuse/share the Button RippleDrawable logic with ImageButton #22298
    area/controls 🎮
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • [Controls] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #22102
    community ✨
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [CI] Clean all yaml in the pipelines of warnings and errors and add a workflow to validate the yaml used. #21345
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Update SkiaSharp #21648
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/gestures
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area/layout 🔲, area/perf 🏎️
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, control-picker
  • [Core] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Fixed creation of the CustomTabsActivityManager #22018
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • fix: fix 22183 RadioButton checked value #22186
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR6
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
